title: Group Analysis for PiB Status with Seqential Deep Learning Model on DTI
descriptions: Used Ants as registration tool to warp information from template space into subject space
Extracted each voxel along each fiber bundles in DTI space to fit the sequential model
With PiB status as group, found 2 fiber bundles satisfying significance level

title: Dilated CNN in Group Analysis of Alzheimerâ€™s Disease
descriptions: Pre-processed the dMRI to extract the information of fiber bundles
Applied SPD/ODF Manifold into Dilated CNN model to directly extract information from DTI/ODF
Speed up the training and testing model with competitive number of parameters with the state of the art
With CSF and APOE biomarkers, got statistically significant results on several fiber bundles

title: Statistical Recurrent Model on the Manifold
descriptions: Defined the operator in the manifold space
Applied SPD manifold into statistical recurrent model
Significantly reduced the number of parameters of the video classification model
Used this model to achieve the state of art of accuraccy in UCF11 dataset

title: Correlationship for Image-Text Pair in Latent Space
descriptions: Applied the pre-trained CNN as the feature extractor from image side
Applied the word2vec method on text as the representive of sentence
Used t-SNE to minimum the KL divergence between latent space and the Image-Text pair
Got meaningful result for the local dataset

title: Form Line Detection in the Picture
descriptions: Developed a system that detects and recognizes the form lines in pictures
Used the bidirectional RNN method to achieve the state of the art, with MXNet as the core of the deep-learning system
Tested in multiple databases such as the NIST Special Database 2 and got a high accuracy rate

title: Keywords Detection in Video
descriptions: Developed a system that detects and recognizes Chinese characters in videos
Conducted  edge  detection  and  stroke  width  transform  to  generate  candidatepatches that might contain characters
Used the GoogLeNet to recognize characters in the patches with high likelihood
Implemented the A-star search with distance heuristic to speed up the detectionof characters in following frames

title: Emotion Detection in Voice Recordings
descriptions: Used different classifiers to predict the emotion of a speaker in a voice memo
Extracted voice features like MFCC, LPCC, Zero Cross Rate, etc., from FAU Aibo Emotion Corpus dataset
Trained both an SVM and a neural network using the features, tested them, and compared their accuracy with the state-of-the-art
